courses.Name: PGP - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
courses.TagLine: Get ready for tomorrow with a comprehensive course in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.
courses.Description: Get ready for tomorrow with a comprehensive course in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. An in-depth, all inclusive curriculum designed by top industry experts, personaized course content, hands on case studies and projects - all delivered through live, engaging mentoring sessions will help you transform your career and start your career journey in AI.
courses.EligibilityCriteria: None. If you are passionate about learning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and you want to get into the field of AI, you can enroll in this program.
WhatToLearn: What is Machine Learning?
The main steps in a typical Machine Learning project.
Handling, cleaning, and preparing data.
Selecting and engineering features.
Selecting a model and tuning hyperparameters using cross-validation.
The main challenges of Machine Learning, in particular underfitting and overfitting (the bias/variance tradeoff).
The most common learning algorithms: Linear and Polynomial Regression
Logistic Regression, k-Nearest Neighbors, Support Vector Machines, Decision Trees, Random Forests, and Ensemble methods.
Reducing the dimensionality of the training data to fight the curse of dimensionality.
Other unsupervised learning techniques, including clustering, density estimation and anomaly detection.
Neural Network: Fundamentals
Building and training neural nets using TensorFlow and Keras.
The most important neural net architectures: feedforward neural nets, convolutional nets, recurrent nets, long short-term memory (LSTM) nets, autoencoders and generative adversarial networks (GANs).
Techniques for training deep neural nets.
Scaling neural networks for large datasets.
Computer Vision
Natural Language Processing
Learning strategies with Reinforcement Learning.
Handling uncertainty with Bayesian Deep Learning

Topics: Anaconda and Jupyter notebook – Installation & function
Python fundamentals I: Data structures, functions, files, packages and routines
Python fundamentals II: OOP with Python
Numpy I: Arrays and Vectorized computation
Numpy II: Array manipulation, Broadcasting and Sorting
Pandas I: Introduction to pandas data structures: Series and Dataframes
Pandas II: Data Preparation, Join, Combine, Reshape
Pandas III: Data Aggregation and Group Operations
Probability Distributions - Types of distribution – Binomial, Poisson & Normal distribution
Data Visualization with Matploptlib and Seaborn
Difference between the Statistical and ML Approaches
Getting Started with Regression: Linear Regression
Errors and cost functions: Loss, cost and score
Case Study: Real Estate Price Prediction
Getting Started with Classification: Logistic Regression

Modules.ModuleName: More Classifiers: kNN and Naïve Bayes

Topics: Training and Visualizing a Decision Tree
Assignment: MNIST Dataset: Training Ensemble Learners
Choosing the Right Number of Dimensions
Selecting a Kernel and Tuning Hyperparameters
Other Dimentionality Reduction Techniques: LLE, MDS, tSNE
Assignment: Human Activity Recognition from Samsung Galaxy S3 mobile phones
Other Anomaly Detection and Novelty Detection Algorithms
Case Study: Customer Segmentation from online Retail Sales Data
Introduction to Neural Networks and Deep Learning
Tensor Flow & Keras for Neural Networks & Deep Learning
Need for memory in neural networks
Types of sequential models – One to many, many to one, many to many
Case Study: Sentiment Analysis using LSTM
How to train and common challenges in GANs

courses.Name: PGP - Data Science
courses.TagLine: Master Big Data and analytics with this cutting edge curriculum on Data Science.
courses.Description: Data science is an inter-disciplinary field of study that combines domain expertise, programming skills and uses scientific methods, processes, algorithms and systems to extract knowledge and insights from structured and unstructured data. In this comprehensive course, you will gain a foundational understanding and job-ready skillset in one of the most in-demand areas of expertise in todays data driven world.
courses.EligibilityCriteria: None. If you are passionate about learning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and you want to get into the field of AI, you can enroll in this program.
WhatToLearn: The Data Science Toolkit
Foundations of Data Science.
What is Machine Learning?
The main steps in a typical Machine Learning project.
Handling, cleaning, and preparing data.
Selecting and engineering features.
Selecting a model and tuning hyperparameters using cross-validation.
The main challenges of Machine Learning, in particular underfitting and overfitting (the bias/variance tradeoff).
The most common learning algorithms: Linear and Polynomial Regression, Logistic Regression, k-Nearest Neighbors, Support Vector Machines, Decision Trees, Random Forests, and Ensemble methods.
Reducing the dimensionality of the training data to fight the curse of dimensionality.
Other unsupervised learning techniques, including clustering, density estimation and anomaly detection.
Time series forecasting.
Neural Network: Fundamentals.
Building and training neural nets using TensorFlow and Keras.
The most important neural net architectures: feedforward neural nets, recurrent nets, long short-term memory (LSTM) nets and autoencoders.
Techniques for training deep neural nets.
Scaling neural networks for large datasets.
Learning strategies with Reinforcement Learning.
Natural Language Processing

courses.TagLine: Take a deep dive into Deep Learning, and master one of the most sought after skills today.
courses.Description: Get ready for tomorrow with a comprehensive course in Deep Learning. An in-depth, all inclusive curriculum designed by top industry experts, personaized course content, hands on case studies and projects - all delivered through live, engaging mentoring sessions will help you transform your career and start your career journey in AI.
courses.EligibilityCriteria: None. If you are passionate about learning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and you want to get into the field of AI, you can enroll in this program.

Machine Learning foundations.
An introduction to neural networks
Building and training neural nets using TensorFlow and Keras.

Techniques for training deep neural nets.
Scaling neural networks for large datasets.
Computer Vision.
Natural Language Processing.
Learning strategies with Reinforcement Learning.
Handling uncertainty with Bayesian Deep Learning.

courses.Name: Build an AI Chatbot with IBM Watson
courses.TagLine: Build an AI powered chatbot that delights your users!
courses.Description: In todays business landscape, chatbots have exploded in popularity due to the myriad benefits they bring. Due to the advancements in cloud computing, AI platforms and services are also at your fingertip. The goal of this course is to teach you how to build your own personal customer assistant chatbot that can interact with users intelligently, and automatically search a knowledgebase to answer queries, all with very little programming!
courses.EligibilityCriteria: None. If you are passionate about learning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and you want to get into the field of AI, you can enroll in this program.
WhatToLearn: What are Chatbots?
Advantages of an AI powered chatbot.
Your first chatbot.
Intents and Entities: the building blocks of the chatbot.
Dialogflow: teaching it to talk.
Watson Discovery: Smart search.
Putting it all together.
Building your own chatbot!.

Topics: Lab 1: Create an instance of Watson Assistant
Lab 2: Create Dialog Skill and Intents
Lab 8: Add a preview and retrieve your credentials
Working with Context Variables and Slots

courses.Name: Predictive Analytics with Python
courses.TagLine: Build a predictive model from the ground up, using Python.
courses.Description: In this course, you will learn how to build linear and logistic regression model with meaningful variables using statistical and machine learning techniques. You will also learn how to use this model to make predictions and how to present it and its performance to business stakeholders.
courses.EligibilityCriteria: None. If you are passionate about learning Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning and you want to get into the field of AI, you can enroll in this program.
WhatToLearn: Foundations of Predictive Modeling
What is Machine Learning?
The main steps in a typical Machine Learning project.
Handling, cleaning, and preparing data.
Selecting and engineering features.
Selecting a model and tuning hyperparameters using cross-validation.
The main challenges of Machine Learning, in particular underfitting and overfitting (the bias/variance tradeoff).
The most common learning algorithms: Linear and Polynomial Regression, Logistic Regression.
